item.title: Z508 help will rep++
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (playerCommand.equals("cool")) return; else if (p.rights == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=0>[<col=ff0000>Mod<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2 ) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Admin<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cool")) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Owner Nick<col=006400>]<col=FF00FF>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.Donator == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=4>[<col=ff0000>Donator<col=006400>]<col=000000>"+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; } } }

Try that one then, i could have made an error on the first one.

if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cool")) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Owner Nick<col=006400>]<col=FF00FF>"+playerCommand.substring(5));;

That is what i edited, please tell me if it works.

If not try this, this is my last idea :S

if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (playerCommand.equals("cool")) return; else if (p.rights == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=0>[<col=ff0000>Mod<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2 ) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Admin<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cool")) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Owner Nick<col=006400> <col=FF00FF>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.Donator == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=4>[<col=ff0000>Donator<col=006400>]<col=000000>"+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; } } }

Im very sorry if i couldnt help, i tried my hardest, im not the greatest 508 coder anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Z508 help will rep++
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

[quote=“i pk girls, post:1, topic:353424”] if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (playerCommand.equals("cool")) return; else if (p.rights == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=0>[<col=ff0000>Mod<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2 ) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Admin<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cool")) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Owner Nick<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF00FF>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.Donator == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=4>[<col=ff0000>Donator<col=006400>]<col=000000>"+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; } } } is full yell command but when i yell on user “cool” it shows both [admin] and [owner nick] one above the other.

I can’t figure out how to make it so it only says [Owner Nick] part rep++ to any that helps[/quote]

Simply do this,

if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (playerCommand.equals("cool")) return; else if (p.rights == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=0>[<col=ff0000>Mod<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2 ) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Admin<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cool")) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Owner Nick<col=006400>]<col=000000> <col=FF00FF>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.Donator == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=4>[<col=ff0000>Donator<col=006400>]<col=000000>"+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; } } }

Remove the p.username at the end of the “cool”" name command.

Read full topic

item.title: Z508 help will rep++
item.dc:creator: @magekid990 magekid990
item.description:
@magekid990 wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (playerCommand.equals("cool")) return; else if (p.rights == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=0>[<col=ff0000>Mod<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2 ) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Admin<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; (if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cool") && (p.rights == 2)) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Owner Nick<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF00FF>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.Donator == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=4>[<col=ff0000>Donator<col=006400>]<col=000000>"+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; } } }

item.title: Z508 help will rep++
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_girls i pk girls
item.description:
@i_pk_girls wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { for (Player player : Server.engine.players) { if (player != null) { if (playerCommand.equals("cool")) return; else if (p.rights == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=0>[<col=ff0000>Mod<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5)); else if (p.rights >= 2 ) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Admin<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("cool")) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=1>[<col=ff0000>Owner Nick<col=006400>]<col=000000> "+p.username+": <col=FF00FF>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; if (p.Donator == 1) player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "<col=006400><img=4>[<col=ff0000>Donator<col=006400>]<col=000000>"+p.username+": <col=FF3300>"+playerCommand.substring(5));; } } } is full yell command but when i yell on user “cool” it shows both [admin] and [owner nick] one above the other.

I can’t figure out how to make it so it only says [Owner Nick] part rep++ to any that helps
